entry.title: OpenAI Brings ChatGPT to Android as AI Boom Continues
entry.summary: OpenAI wants to gain as many ChatGPT users as possible, and is going beyond web browsers by adding an Android app to its stable.

entry.title: Did You Miss Out on Hamster Races, Anon? HAMS Token Jumps 783%
entry.summary: Degens betting on the price of the HAMS token might be doing even better than degens betting crypto on the actual hamster races.

entry.title: Is Meta's ChatGPT Killer Really Open Source?
entry.summary: The Open Source Initiative told Meta’s Chief AI Scientist that the model they are promoting as Open Source is not really open source.

entry.title: OpenAI, Google, Microsoft Promise White House to Keep AI Safe
entry.summary: Industry leaders commit to safe, secure, and transparent development of artificial intelligence in agreement with the Biden administration.

entry.title: Fed Bent the Rules in Rollout of Instant Payment Service FedNow, Says Custodia CEO
entry.summary: Long pointed to public documents showing Adyen, a FedNow early adopter, got a federal master account in July 2020—a year before it had a U.S. branch.

entry.title: Human Artists Lose Ground in Legal Battle Against AI
entry.summary: U.S. District Judge William Orrick said artists should "provide more facts" to back up claims about alleged copyright infringement by AI companies

entry.title: FTX Lawsuit Alleges SBF Brother Planned to Turn Island Nation Into Doomsday Bunker
entry.summary: Gabriel Bankman-Fried allegedly planned to use Nauru as a shelter for effective altruists in the event of a global catastrophe.

entry.title: Bitfinex Hackers Agree to Forfeit Billions in Bitcoin in Plea Deal
entry.summary: Ilya Lichtenstein and his wife, Heather Morgan, will appear before a judge on August 3 and could face up to 20 years in prison.

entry.title: Welcome to McNuggets Land: McDonald’s Launches Metaverse Game in ‘The Sandbox’
entry.summary: McDonald’s is the latest major brand to debut an immersive metaverse game experience—with NFT and crypto rewards, too.

entry.title: Hackers Drain $3 Million in Ethereum From DeFi Protocol Conic Finance
entry.summary: The new DeFi protocol, which went live in March, has lost more than 1,700 Ethereum.

entry.title: DoJ Accuses SBF of Leaking Caroline Ellison's Diary to 'Discredit a Witness' in FTX Trial
entry.summary: Sam Bankman-Fried attempted to discredit Caroline Ellison by sharing her personal documents to the media, the DOJ alleges.

entry.title: ‘Smart Wallet’ Provider Argent Launches NFT Marketplace Unframed on Starknet
entry.summary: The latest launch "will push the boundaries of what NFT marketplaces can do,” said Argent co-founder Julien Niset.

entry.title: China Targets Travelers With Digital Yuan as Tourist Season Looms
entry.summary: As China enters the summer vacation months, the government is actively promoting the digital yuan to travelers.

entry.title: Space Case? Melania Trump's Apollo 11 NFT Defies NASA Rules
entry.summary: An NFT released by former First Lady Melania Trump features an iconic NASA photo, despite the agency's explicit prohibition on NFTs.

entry.title: Canadians Are Having Crypto Stolen From Their Homes, Police Say
entry.summary: Authorities believe there may be a connection between several robberies that have occurred in Canada involving thieves searching for private keys linked to crypto funds.

entry.title: Crypto Funds Linked to Fentanyl Trade Come Mostly From Centralized Exchanges: Elliptic
entry.summary: Blockchain analytics firm Elliptic found that most crypto funds used in the fentanyl trade can be traced to centralized exchanges.

entry.title: 'Mighty Action Heroes' Puts a Fun Battle Royale Shooter in Your Browser
entry.summary: PREVIEW: Fast-paced battle royale game Mighty Action Heroes doesn't break new ground, but it offers up fun moments in its open beta.

entry.title: You Can Now Bet Crypto on Hamster Races. What Could Go Wrong?
entry.summary: A new site is gripping crypto gamblers by letting them bet cryptocurrency on streamed races between members of the fluffy rodent breed.

entry.title: House Republicans Introduce Bill That Aims to Bring Regulatory Clarity to Crypto
entry.summary: The bill is the product of extensive work by lawmakers on Capitol Hill.

entry.title: You Can Now Customize AI Chatbot ChatGPT to Respond the Way You Want
entry.summary: OpenAI unveils a "custom instruction" feature for ChatGPT users to enable personalized responses from the AI chatbot.

entry.title: Caroline Ellison Admits She Wasn’t 'Well Suited' to Run Alameda Research
entry.summary: In diary entries seen by the New York Times, Ellison also reportedly said it felt great when FTX blew up.

entry.title: Coin Center Blasts 'Messy and Unconstitutional' Senate DeFi Bill
entry.summary: Critics say new legislation will grant the U.S. Treasury overbroad authority while violating freedom of speech.

entry.title: ChatGPT Isn't All That Great at Cybersecurity: Immunefi
entry.summary: Security researchers see ChatGPT as a tool with plenty of potential, but it's dogged by how inaccurate it is at diagnosing security flaws.

entry.title: Solana Is Down Meme Dead? Devs Say Network Had 100% Uptime Since Feb
entry.summary: But as the foundation told Decrypt in an email, that’s “no guarantees of future network performance.”

entry.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta
entry.summary: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner Hive Is Using Old Ethereum Rigs and AI to Make Ordinals Art
entry.summary: “We will create generative AI art with our own GPUs, on our own fine-tuned model of Stable Diffusion," the CEO told Decrypt.

entry.title: Coutts Apologizes for 'Unbanking' Bitcoin-Friendly Nigel Farage
entry.summary: High-end Coutts—which counts members of the Royal Family among its clientele—faced blow back after Farage said his account was closed over political views.

entry.title: Former Binance US CEO Brian Brooks Joins Crypto Asset Manager Hashdex
entry.summary: His ill-fated stint at Binance US wasn't in a news release, which focused on his time as Coinbase's CLO and acting U.S. Comptroller of the Currency.

entry.title: Moonbirds Mythics NFTs Begin Reveal That Will Last at Least 200 Days
entry.summary: The 20,000-strong Mythics NFT collection will be revealed gradually over the span of months as Moonbirds and Oddities holders claim them.

entry.title: UK Government Rejects Proposal to Classify Crypto as Gambling
entry.summary: The government argued that classifying crypto asset trading as gambling would create a misalignment with global standards.

entry.title: Congressman Ritchie Torres: SEC Chair Gensler 'Intent on Sabotaging' Crypto Industry
entry.summary: Congressman Ritchie Torres doubled down on his recent criticisms of Securities and Exchange Commission chair Gary Gensler.

entry.title: Floor App Reveals Ethereum NFT Art Drops Exclusively on iOS and Android
entry.summary: Artist Vinnie Hager will kickstart the series of drops so Floor can, in the CEO’s words, “meet people where they are—on their phone.”

entry.title: Binance Labs Puts $10 Million Into Radiant Capital to Expand to Other Chains
entry.summary: This investment will go toward enabling more Radiant users to move tokens across more chains.

entry.title: What is Bitcoin Mining and How Does It Work?
entry.summary: At the heart of Satoshi Nakamoto’s vision for Bitcoin is mining, a process that both secures the network and incentivizes participation. Find out how it works.

entry.title: El Salvador's Bonds Have Skyrocketed Alongside Bitcoin in 2023
entry.summary: Since the start of the year, both Bitcoin and El Salvador's government bonds have soared.

entry.title: Telegram Bot Tokens Surge Toward $100M Market Cap
entry.summary: The sector has experienced massive growth in a short period, as projects such as Unibot and Ready Swap flood the markets.

entry.title: Museums and Galleries Are Embracing Digital Art, Exploring AI
entry.summary: The future of art, its accessibility, and its audience were explored at Christie’s Art+Tech Summit.

entry.title: ChatGPT's Performance Is Slipping, New Study Says
entry.summary: UC Berkeley researchers found that ChatGPT has not improved over time, and in fact, may have gotten worse.

entry.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.

entry.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO
entry.summary: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.

entry.title: Gran Saga Unlimited Early Access: Inside the Anime MMORPG on Aptos
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin plays Gran Saga: Unlimited's second community playtest, reports her findings, and offers her opinion and insights on the upcoming game, which will offer optional Aptos NFTs.

entry.title: 100 Thieves' Moe Says Blockchain Games Will 'Eventually' Be Accepted by Livestreamers
entry.summary: 100 Thieves content creator and gamer Moe also goes by "Yassuo" online after his favorite League of Legends character. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks him about 100 Thieves' future crypto plans and whether Moe thinks creators like xQc and Pokimane might ever come around to blockchain games.

entry.title: "Games of the Future Are Going to Be Different," Says Splinterlands Cofounder
entry.summary: Splinterlands Cofounder Matt Rosen tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the game has evolved over its five-year history and why he doesn't listen to the FUD around crypto.

entry.title: Inside Champions Ascension: Like 'For Honor' with NFTs?
entry.summary: Plai Labs Marketing Director Payton Kaleiwahea tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about player response to the combat game Champions Ascension in development, which offers arena combat, raid bosses, AI landscape features, and more.

entry.title: Ex-Activision VP Michael Lee: Gaming Is Crypto's 'Killer App'
entry.summary: Former Activision Vice President Michael Lee is now the SVP of Growth at Matter Labs. At the 3XP gaming conference, Lee sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss crypto gaming and give his predictions for the industry.

entry.title: Behind the Scenes with AMGI Studios and My Pet Hooligan
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes to Burbank, California for a behind-the-scenes tour of AMGI Studios, the developers of upcoming game My Pet Hooligan.

entry.title: Why Legend of Arcadia Chose Sui Over EVM Chains
entry.summary: Legend of Arcadia Executive Producer Andy Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the game and why they switched from EVM to new protocol Sui.

entry.title: Rumble Racing Star Game Preview: Is This Mario Kart With NFTs?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin shares a first look at Delabs' upcoming lawn mower racing game Rumble Racing Star, which offers a large cast of quirky characters pulled from the worlds of Bored Ape Yacht Club, Pudgy Penguins, and more.

entry.title: Why Laguna Games Turned Down 'Game of Thrones' for Crypto Unicorns
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Laguna Games about why the team chose to move away from an offer with WB Games to develop a Game of Thrones licensed title—and made Crypto Unicorns instead.

entry.title: Mythical Games CEO John Linden on NFL Rivals Topping 1M Downloads
entry.summary: Mythical Games just raised a $37 million Series C1 round on the back of the early success of NFL Rivals, which has already topped a million downloads in two months. Mythical CEO John Linden joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the launch and impact of NFL Rivals.

entry.title: How Ava Labs Is Approaching Gaming on Avalanche
entry.summary: At 3XP, Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss some of the biggest Avalanche-based games on the horizon and how the company is approaching and thinking about Web3 gaming.

entry.title: Ogimi Founder David Gull on Why AI Should Be Your Meditation Coach
entry.summary: Ogimi founder David Gull speaks with Decrypt's Jason Nelson about its AI-driven meditation guides and how the technology can enable a more unique, custom-tailored meditation experience for users.

entry.title: VaynerSports Gaming VP Discusses Web3 Content Creators, Decentralized Streaming
entry.summary: Darren Glover, VP of Gaming at talent management agency VaynerSports, sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss the challenges faced by Web3-centric content creators, the current state of the esports market, and how decentralized streaming platforms can challenge centralized leaders like Twitch.

entry.title: NYXL Co-Founder on the State of Esports and Crypto Gaming
entry.summary: Rohit Gupta, co-founder of esports team NYXL, chats with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss challenges faced by the esports industry and opportunities and experiments in Web3.

entry.title: What Is GameBridge? Inside Shrapnel's Gaming Innovation
entry.summary: Marc Mercuri, Head of Platform for Web3 shooter Shrapnel, speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo about GameBridge, a feature that simplifies blockchain item composability and interoperability.
